mapper.select: select * from MM_EVENT where EVENT_DATE >= sysdate

select DISTINCT e.* from MM_EVENT e left join MM_HASHTAG_USE u on(e.EVENT_NUM = u.EVENT_NUM)
e.EVENT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND e.EVENT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
e.EVENT_DATE >= sysdate
AND (upper(e.EVENT_TITLE) like upper(#{keyword}) OR upper(e.EVENT_CONTENT) like upper(#{keyword}) OR upper(e.EVENT_LOCATION) like upper(#{keyword}))
AND e.CATEGORY_NUM= #{category}
AND u.HASHTAG_NUM = #{hashtag}
order by EVENT_DATE

select DISTINCT e.* from MM_EVENT e WHERE
e.EVENT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND e.EVENT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

select DISTINCT * from MM_EVENT e left join MM_HASHTAG_USE u on(e.EVENT_NUM = u.EVENT_NUM) left join MM_HASHTAG h on(u.HASHTAG_NUM = h.HASHTAG_NUM) where upper(h.HASHTAG_TITLE) like #{hashtag}
AND e.EVENT_DATE >= sysdate

select DISTINCT * from MM_EVENT e left join MM_CATEGORY C using(category_num) where upper(category_name) like upper(#{category})
AND e.EVENT_DATE >= sysdate
order by e.EVENT_DATE
select count(*) from MM_EVENT_ATTENDEE where EVENT_NUM = #{event_num}
select USER_SAVE,USER_NAME,USER_ID from MM_USER where USER_NUM in ( select USER_NUM from MM_EVENT_ATTENDEE where EVENT_NUM = #{event_num})
